name: Homemade Tater Tots®
author: Shaysfoodjourney
summary: Never have to buy frozen store bought Tater Tots® anymore. This will be a good, more healthy recipe for kids and adults to remember their childhood favorite. Frozen-friendly! Serve immediately, garnished with parsley. Dip the tots in our famous Divine Kuizine Remoulade sauce.
directions: Place potatoes in a pot; add cold water until potatoes are covered by 1 inch
Bring to a boil; reduce heat
Simmer until potatoes are softened, about 10 minutes; drain
Cool until easily handled, 10 to 15 minutes
Shred potatoes into thin strips with a box grater; drain excess water
Place shredded potato into a large mixing bowl
Stir parsley, flour, salt, seasoned pepper, and onion powder into the potatoes until combined
Shape potato mixture into potato nuggets
Heat peanut oil in a deep-fryer or large stockpot to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place potato nuggets in the fryer, 5 to 10 at a time
Cook until golden brown and crispy, 3 to 4 minutes
Transfer to a paper towel lined plate
